books

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • books.Book
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Handwritten, Printed

    public abstract class Book
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Book(int bookID, java.lang.String bookType)
      Constructs a new Book object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBookID()
      Returns Book Id value of this book.
      java.lang.String getBookType()
      Returns Book Type value of this book.
      LibraryMember getWhoHas()
      Returns the library member object who has this book as borrowed or as reading in the library.
      boolean isRead()
      Returns whether the book is being read in the library at that particular time or not
      boolean isTaken()
      Returns whether the book is borrowed from the library before or not
      boolean isValidBorrow()
      Controls and returns if this Book instance is valid to be borrowed
      abstract void returnBook(LibraryMember member)
      Carry outs the returning action of the borrowed or reading book.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book(int bookID,
            java.lang.String bookType)
        Constructs a new Book object. The book ID and Book Type are given as parameters.
        Parameters:
        bookID - The ID value which will assign to this book instance.
        bookType - The Book type value which will assign to this book instance.

    • Method Detail

      • isRead

        public boolean isRead()
        Returns whether the book is being read in the library at that particular time or not
        Returns:
        true if isRead true, otherwise false.

      • getBookID

        public int getBookID()
        Returns Book Id value of this book.
        Returns:
        BookID fields value.

      • isValidBorrow

        public boolean isValidBorrow()
        Controls and returns if this Book instance is valid to be borrowed
        Returns:
        true if the book is not borrowed and the book type is Printed; false otherwise.

      • getBookType

        public java.lang.String getBookType()
        Returns Book Type value of this book.
        Returns:
        bookType fields value.

      • isTaken

        public boolean isTaken()
        Returns whether the book is borrowed from the library before or not
        Returns:
        true if isTaken true, otherwise false.

      • getWhoHas

        public LibraryMember getWhoHas()
        Returns the library member object who has this book as borrowed or as reading in the library.
        Returns:
        whoHas fields value which is a LibraryMember object.

      • returnBook

        public abstract void returnBook(LibraryMember member)
        Carry outs the returning action of the borrowed or reading book. It initializes in the children classes.
        Parameters:
        member - The member who has the book and will have return to the library.
